Comment: We already have customers calling in panicked confusion because they are totally checked out from the news.  The smart ones snapped up our non-tariffed inventory.  Prices are calculated on the cost at time of sailing, so the stuff that is landing now has the tariff price.  This will have a long tail, ocean-freight is usually 60 days on the water, then another 30 days in customs/unloading/rail/truck transport.  It the tariffs were canceled today, we'll still have higher prices for another two months.
Author: Iowa_Dave
